lines.text: Just keep your people out of here!
But you have a bar. You have a licence. You have to serve anybody who comes in here, don't you?
Yeah, but this is a lousy bar with a lousy service!
[In Samson's Bar. Nappa's man are making trouble. Samson gets angry]
Just keep your people out of here!
But you have a bar. You have a licence. You have to serve anybody who comes in here, don't you?

[smiles]
Yeah, but this is a lousy bar with a lousy service!
